page.title: 07GAMES IN LOSSIEMOUTH
page.content: {Pigs Fly! Any number can play this game. One person is the pig, the rest are flying things. Everyone stands in a space. The pig shouts any word, then says "Fly!" e.g. if the pig says "Superman flies!" that's true, so everyone flaps their arms, but if he says "Horses fly!" which is not true, and if anyone flaps their arms they are out. You can also be out if the pig says "Pigs fly!" then everyone has to run away from the pig. The person who is caught is out. The last one out is the winner. {Cheeky Nelly Cheeky Nelly is a game any number can play. We knock on doors then run and hide behind a wall or a corner. The person comes out and is angry at us and we laugh at him. Aren't we a horrible bunch!
